staffplugin:StaffPluginProvider.name: VMM People Directory Provider
staffplugin:StaffPluginProvider.description: This people directory provider can be used for Virtual Member Manager based people queries.

factories.name: VMM People Directory Configuration
factories.description: This people directory configuration can be used for Virtual Member Manager based people queries.

staffplugin:StaffPluginProvider.name: LDAP People Directory Provider
staffplugin:StaffPluginProvider.description: This people directory provider can be used for LDAP based people queries.

factories.name: LDAP People Directory Configuration sample
factories.description: This sample people directory configuration can be used for LDAP based people queries.

resourceProperties.name: AuthenticationAlias
resourceProperties.description: When not set, anonymous logon to the LDAP server is used. This property represents the authentication alias used to connect to LDAP. The alias must be already defined in Security > Global security > Java Authentication and Authorization Service > J2C authentication data. The name of the alias must be entered here. Sample: 'mycomputer/My LDAP Alias'.

resourceProperties.name: AuthenticationType
resourceProperties.description: Set to 'simple' for a non-anonymous connection, otherwise not set. If set, the AuthenticationAlias parameter is required as well.

resourceProperties.name: BaseDN
resourceProperties.description: Default base dn for LDAP search operations. Sample: 'o=acme,c=us'.

resourceProperties.name: ContextFactory
resourceProperties.description: The name of the JNDI contextFactory Java class. Sample: 'com.sun.jndi.ldap.LdapCtxFactory'.

resourceProperties.name: ProviderURL
resourceProperties.description: The provider URL of the LDAP/JNDI server to connect to. Sample: 'ldap://localhost:389'.

resourceProperties.name: SearchScope
resourceProperties.description: Default search scope for LDAP search operations. Allowed values are: 'objectScope', 'onelevelScope' and 'subtreeScope'. Sample: 'subtreeScope'.

resourceProperties.name: CasesensitivenessForObjectclasses
resourceProperties.description: When set to true, LDAP objectclass names will be treated in a case-sensitive manner (e.g. inetOrgPerson and inetorgperson will be treated as different names).

resourceProperties.name: additionalParameterName1
resourceProperties.description: Allows to set an arbitrary additional JNDI property for the connection to the LDAP server.

resourceProperties.name: additionalParameterValue1
resourceProperties.description: Normally optional property, gets mandatory when additionalParameterName1 is set. Value for additionalParameterName1.

resourceProperties.name: additionalParameterName2
resourceProperties.description: Allows to set an arbitrary additional JNDI property for the connection to the LDAP server.

resourceProperties.name: additionalParameterValue2
resourceProperties.description: Normally optional property, gets mandatory when additionalParameterName2 is set. Value for additionalParameterName2.

resourceProperties.name: additionalParameterName3
resourceProperties.description: Allows to set an arbitrary additional JNDI property for the connection to the LDAP server.

resourceProperties.name: additionalParameterValue3
resourceProperties.description: Normally optional property, gets mandatory when additionalParameterName3 is set. Value for additionalParameterName3.

resourceProperties.name: additionalParameterName4
resourceProperties.description: Allows to set an arbitrary additional JNDI property for the connection to the LDAP server.

resourceProperties.name: additionalParameterValue4
resourceProperties.description: Normally optional property, gets mandatory when additionalParameterName4 is set. Value for additionalParameterName4.

resourceProperties.name: additionalParameterName5
resourceProperties.description: Allows to set an arbitrary additional JNDI property for the connection to the LDAP server.

resourceProperties.name: additionalParameterValue5
resourceProperties.description: Normally optional property, gets mandatory when additionalParameterName5 is set. Value for additionalParameterName5.

resourceProperties.name: AuthenticationAlias
resourceProperties.description: When not set, anonymous logon to the LDAP server is used. This property represents the authentication alias used to connect to LDAP. The alias must be already defined in Security > Global security > Java Authentication and Authorization Service > J2C authentication data. The name of the alias must be entered here. Sample: 'mycomputer/My LDAP Alias'.

resourceProperties.name: AuthenticationType
resourceProperties.description: Set to 'simple' for a non-anonymous connection, otherwise not set. If set, the AuthenticationAlias parameter is required as well.

resourceProperties.name: BaseDN

resourceProperties.name: ProviderURL
resourceProperties.description: The provider URL of the LDAP/JNDI server to connect to. Sample: 'ldap://localhost:389'.

resourceProperties.name: SearchScope
resourceProperties.description: Default search scope for LDAP search operations. Allowed values are: 'objectScope', 'onelevelScope' and 'subtreeScope'. Sample: 'subtreeScope'.

resourceProperties.name: CasesensitivenessForObjectclasses
resourceProperties.description: When set to true, LDAP objectclass names will be treated in a case-sensitive manner (e.g. inetOrgPerson and inetorgperson will be treated as different names).

resourceProperties.name: additionalParameterName1
resourceProperties.description: Allows to set an arbitrary additional JNDI property for the connection to the LDAP server.

resourceProperties.name: additionalParameterValue1
resourceProperties.description: Normally optional property, gets mandatory when additionalParameterName1 is set. Value for additionalParameterName1.

resourceProperties.description: Allows to set an arbitrary additional JNDI property for the connection to the LDAP server.

resourceProperties.name: additionalParameterValue2
resourceProperties.description: Normally optional property, gets mandatory when additionalParameterName2 is set. Value for additionalParameterName2.

resourceProperties.description: Allows to set an arbitrary additional JNDI property for the connection to the LDAP server.

resourceProperties.name: additionalParameterValue3
resourceProperties.description: Normally optional property, gets mandatory when additionalParameterName3 is set. Value for additionalParameterName3.

resourceProperties.name: additionalParameterValue4
resourceProperties.description: Normally optional property, gets mandatory when additionalParameterName4 is set. Value for additionalParameterName4.

resourceProperties.description: Allows to set an arbitrary additional JNDI property for the connection to the LDAP server.

resourceProperties.name: additionalParameterValue5
resourceProperties.description: Normally optional property, gets mandatory when additionalParameterName5 is set. Value for additionalParameterName5.
